channel.title: SMF Help
channel.description: Hey guys, so I converted to SMF because I can't afford vBulletin atm, and I was wondering if anybody knew any websites that used SMF that have really cool features/themes that I could look at for inspiration. Thanks! *Note* I'm not very creative and am not very good with web design/development.

item.title: SMF Help
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:6, topic:520927”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=639436.msg4310093#msg4310093 date=1370613001]
Have you already seen what DzinerStudio has? I personally hate most of their themes, but the majority of people tend to like them.
[/quote]
No but Ill check him out, thanks!

vBulletin, why would one need a vbulletin forums? Simply because it says vbulletin on the bottom does not mean it is the best. Honestly, get phpBB and you’re fine. phpBB has a lot of customization when it comes to templates

I converted my phpBB to smf. Vbulletin gives your a bit more freedom with your site.[/quote]

I think i disagree with the “freedom with your site” statement. With SMF you can always go into the source files and edit the entire forum making changes and customizing the site to whatever you want.

Read full topic

Have you already seen what DzinerStudio has? I personally hate most of their themes, but the majority of people tend to like them.

KempiScape:

vBulletin, why would one need a vbulletin forums? Simply because it says vbulletin on the bottom does not mean it is the best. Honestly, get phpBB and you’re fine. phpBB has a lot of customization when it comes to templates

I converted my phpBB to smf. Vbulletin gives your a bit more freedom with your site.
